channel.title: CISA KEV Catalog Updates
channel.description: This feed notifies when CISA updates the KEV catalog.

item.title: KEV Catalog Updated: 2025-05-15
item.description: CISA updated the KEV catalog on 2025-05-15. This update includes 3 new CVE(s): CVE-2025-42999, CVE-2024-12987, CVE-2025-4664
